CustomField.description: Used in determining whether a MG should create a Matching Credit Payment on the originating pledge. Both the originating/constituent pledge should have this checkbox as true to create the Matching Credit Payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in determining whether a MG should create a Matching Credit Payment on the originating pledge. Both the originating/constituent pledge should have this checkbox as true to create the Matching Credit Payment.
CustomField.label: Create Matching Credit Payment
